CustomField.description: In this field, enter the API name of the Sales Order Line field the system is to evaluate for the tax locale. (Ex. OrderApi__Shipping_Country__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In this field, enter the API name of the Sales Order Line field the system is to evaluate for the tax locale. (Ex. OrderApi__Shipping_Country__c)
CustomField.label: Tax Locale Field
